verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H1697>concerning<s%> the <S%H1226>dearth.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H56>mourns,<s%> and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> thereof <S%H535>languish;<s%> they are <S%H6937>black<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H6682>cry<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H5927>gone<s%> up.

And their <S%H117>nobles<s%> have <S%H7971>sent<s%> their <S%H6810>little<s%> ones to the <S%H4325>waters:<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1356>pits,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> they <S%H7725>returned<s%> with their <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H7387>empty;<s%> they were <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H3637>confounded,<s%> and <S%H2645>covered<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

<S%H5668>Because<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> is beat <S%H2865>down,<s%> for there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H406>plowmen<s%> were <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> they <S%H2645>covered<s%> their <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

<S%H3588>Yes,<s%> <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H365>hind<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3205>calved<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H5800>forsook<s%> it, <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1758>grass.<s%>

And the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>asses<s%> did <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H8205>high<s%> places, they <S%H7602>snuffed<s%> up the <S%H7307>wind<s%> like <S%H8577>dragons;<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> did <S%H3615>fail,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6212>grass.<s%>

O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H518>though<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against us, <S%H6213>do<s%> you it for your <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake:<s%> for our <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H7231>many;<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you.

O the <S%H4723>hope<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3467>savior<s%> thereof in <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should you be as a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and as a <S%H732>wayfaring<s%> man that <S%H5186>turns<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> to <S%H3885>tarry<s%> for a night?

<S%H4100>Why<s%> should you be as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1724>astonished,<s%> as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3467>save?<s%> yet you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> are in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of us, and we are <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H5117>leave<s%> us not.

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> have they <S%H157>loved<s%> to <S%H5128>wander,<s%> they have not <S%H2820>refrained<s%> their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> does not <S%H7521>accept<s%> them; he will <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to me, <S%H6419>Pray<s%> not for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> for their <S%H2896>good.<s%>

<S%H3588>When<s%> they <S%H6684>fast,<s%> I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> their <S%H7440>cry;<s%> and <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering and an <S%H4503>oblation,<s%> I will not <S%H7521>accept<s%> them: but I will <S%H3615>consume<s%> them by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to them, You shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall you have <S%H7458>famine;<s%> but I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H571>assured<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> in my <S%H8034>name:<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them: they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to you a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H2377>vision<s%> and <S%H7081>divination,<s%> and a thing of <S%H434>nothing,<s%> and the <S%H8649>deceit<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> that <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and I <S%H7971>sent<s%> them not, yet they <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2719>Sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall not be in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> By <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H5030>prophets<s%> be <S%H8552>consumed.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> they <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> shall be <S%H7993>cast<s%> out in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7458>famine<s%> and the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they shall have <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H6912>bury<s%> them, them, their <S%H802>wives,<s%> nor their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> nor their <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> for I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> on them.

Therefore you shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to them; Let my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3381>run<s%> down with <S%H1832>tears<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3119>day,<s%> and let them not <S%H1820>cease:<s%> for the <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H7665>broken<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7667>breach,<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2470>grievous<s%> <S%H4347>blow.<s%>

<S%H518>If<s%> I <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H7704>field,<s%> then <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword!<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> then <S%H2009>behold<s%> them that are <S%H8463>sick<s%> with <S%H7458>famine!<s%> <S%H3588>yes,<s%> <S%H1571><s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5503>go<s%> <S%H5503>about<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that they <S%H3045>know<s%> not.

Have you utterly <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> has your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>loathed<s%> <S%H6726>Zion?<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> have you <S%H5221>smitten<s%> us, and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4832>healing<s%> for us? we <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2896>good;<s%> and for the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H4832>healing,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> <S%H1205>trouble!<s%>
We <S%H3045>acknowledge,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> our <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers:<s%> for we have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against you.

Do not <S%H5006>abhor<s%> us, for your <S%H8034>name's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> do not <S%H5034>disgrace<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of your <S%H3519>glory:<s%> <S%H2142>remember,<s%> <S%H6565>break<s%> not your <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us.

Are there any among the <S%H1892>vanities<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> that can cause <S%H1653>rain?<s%> or can the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7241>showers?<s%> are not you he, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God?<s%> therefore we will <S%H6960>wait<s%> on you: for you have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things.
